game.name: Pet Hop
game.description:
This time you have cute rabbits to control and kill your time! We are damn sure that spending time with these lovely pets will make your day. Play Pet Hop especially when you are feeling extremely bored! Start with a cute rabbit that is just out on the loose and has got puzzled how to cross the busy traffic and cover the maximum distance. Would you like to become his helping hand? Join this brand new adventure challenge and help fuzzy pets to cross the road safely every time they want!

There are multiple obstacles to deal with for him. However, your guidance can help him find the way towards success. Let him move forward by tapping or clicking the screen while he can move horizontally by swiping left or right. Do not forget to grab the coins you see on the path and use them to unlock multiple pets in the shop of this cute HTML5 hopping game! Try to hope him wisely and guide him to go as far as possible to create the highest score!

You would have multiple pets including rabbit, chicken, tiger and panda to choose from. Make sure that you avoid different types of vehicles on road to run safely. Be careful and try not to hop into the water! There are 3 lanes to run on the road. The easy and intuitive controls supported by seamless gameplay and attractive graphics will be enough to keep you glued to the screen for long. Good luck to hop all pets safely for as long as possible and have fun without download!

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Pet Hop at atmegame.com ! We have selected this  games for best excitement and thrill in you!

game.mobileControlKeys: TAP ON SCREEN TO CONTROL PET TO CROSS THE ROAD
game.webControlKeys: W,A,S,D / L CLIK OF MOUSE TO MOVE
